name: Ali Parker
title: Co Founder at The Broad Collective || Experiential & Brand Marketing, Strategy and Production

experience.title: Co-founder / Co-owner
description: Built an agency from the ground up by optimizing existing relationships, creating new partnerships, and leveraging 10+ years of industry knowledge, resulting in a 60% year-over-year revenue growth (pre-COVID-19).

experience.title: Experiential and Creative Producer
description: Hired by agencies and brands to conceptualize and produce experiential marketing campaigns.
Led a team of creative freelancers and successfully executed multiple projects simultaneously.

experience.title: Director of Production
description: Managed 12 key accounts and a team of 10+ employees at an experiential marketing agency.
Advocated for improved company benefits to enhance employee retention in a high-turnover industry.
Represented the executive team onsite at events to oversee production teams and explore new business opportunities.

experience.title: Account Director
description: Oversaw accounts and internal teams for Mark Anthony Brands and Teva.
Increased account revenue and profit margins through strategic client relationship building.

experience.title: Senior Producer
description: Managed 30+ events for Red Bull, Nike, Muscle Milk, NASCAR, DC, and other brands.
Trained and mentored Assistant Producers and Project Coordinators.

experience.title: Event Director || Warrior Dash
description: Planned and executed 25+ domestic and international events in active entertainment.
Developed event strategies and RFPs for international government approvals.

experience.title: Production Manager || Firefly Music Festival
description: Led on-site logistics and operations for the festival's 30K daily attendees.

experience.title: Manager/Visual Merchandiser
description: Assisted owner in product selection, styling, and marketing strategies.
Designed visual merchandising displays and managed client relationships.
